item.title: 纽柯预计第一季度利润低于预期，原因是钢材价格下跌
item.description: 纽柯公司（Nucor Corp）周四预测 2025 财年第一季度利润低于预期，原因是疲软的钢材价格环境继续拖累其平均销售价格。【原文：Nucor Corp on Thursday forecast first-quarter 2025 profit below estimates as a weak steel pricing environment continues to weigh on its average selling prices, sending the steelmaker's shares down 4% after the bell.】

item.title: 独家报道特斯拉以旧换新在马斯克的反弹中再创新高
item.description: 埃德蒙兹（Edmunds）的数据显示，在抗议首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）担任美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）顾问的浪潮中，本月特斯拉电动汽车的交易量创下历史新高。【原文：Motorists have traded in a record number of Tesla electric vehicles this month, Edmunds data showed, amid a wave of protests against CEO Elon Musk's work as an adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 巴西部长称美国关税谈判旷日持久，将乙醇与糖联系起来
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周四表示，巴西政府预计将与美国进行漫长的关税谈判，并表示谈判将包括涉及糖和乙醇的贸易讨论。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Thursday his government expects lengthy tariff negotiations with the United States, and suggested they would include trade discussions involving sugar and ethanol.】

item.title: 巴西化妆品集团 Natura 公布重组计划和领导层变动情况
item.description: 巴西化妆品集团 Natura 周四宣布了一项重组方案，将目前上市的控股公司 Natura&Co 并入其子公司 Natura Cosmeticos，后者将在巴西证券交易所上市。【原文：Brazilian cosmetic group Natura announced on Thursday a restructuring proposal to integrate the currently listed holding company Natura&Co into its subsidiary Natura Cosmeticos, which will then have shares in Brazil's stock exchange.】

item.title: 市场持续疲软，伦纳季度利润下降
item.description: Lennar Corp 周四公布的第一季度利润下降，原因是高抵押贷款利率和房价使潜在买家望而却步，股价盘后下跌 4%。【原文：Lennar Corp reported lower first-quarter profit on Thursday, as high mortgage rates and house prices deterred potential buyers, sending shares down 4% after the bell.】

item.title: ProSieben 与 General Atlantic 达成数字资产交易
item.description: 德国媒体集团 ProSiebenSat.1 周四表示，已批准与美国私募股权公司 General Atlantic 就收购该美国公司持有的约会平台 ParshipMeet 和互联网控股公司 NuCom Group 少数股权达成的协议。【原文：German media group ProSiebenSat.1 said on Thursday it has approved an agreement with U.S. private equity firm General Atlantic on the acquisition of the U.S. firm's minority stakes in dating platform ParshipMeet and internet holding NuCom Group.】

item.title: 交易日 没有方向 杰罗姆
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 特朗普政府将开放阿拉斯加更多土地用于石油和天然气钻探
item.description: 美国内政部长道格-伯格姆（Doug Burgum）周四宣布，将采取措施开放更多的石油和天然气租赁面积，并取消对在阿拉斯加修建液化天然气管道和采矿道路的限制，以执行唐纳德-特朗普总统的行政命令，消除该州能源开发的障碍。【原文：U.S. Interior Secretary Doug Burgum on Thursday announced steps to open up more acreage for oil and gas leasing and lift restrictions on building an LNG pipeline and mining road in Alaska, carrying out President Donald Trump's executive order to remove barriers to energy development in the state.】

item.title: 耐克因假日需求和新产品上市，季度收入降幅较小
item.description: 耐克公司周四公布的季度营收降幅小于预期，主要得益于假日季的增长以及新款 Pegasus Premium 和 Vomero 18 运动鞋系列需求的上升。【原文：Nike posted a smaller-than-expected drop in quarterly revenue on Thursday, benefiting from a holiday season bump and an uptick in demand for its new Pegasus Premium and Vomero 18 sneaker lines.】

item.title: 联邦快递下调全年业绩预期，努力弥补 USPS 的合同损失
item.description: 联邦快递公司（FedEx Corp）周四下调了全年营收和利润预期，因为这家包裹递送公司在与其最大客户美国邮政服务公司的合同于去年终止后，正在寻求新的业务。【原文：FedEx Corp lowered its full-year revenue and profit forecast on Thursday, as the parcel delivery firm seeks new business after its contract with its largest customer, the United States Postal Service, ended last year.】

item.title: 美光公司因人工智能存储芯片需求预测季度收入增长
item.description: 美光科技（Micron Technology）周四预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这表明人工智能行业对其高带宽内存（HBM）芯片的需求强劲。【原文：Micron Technology forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling strong demand for its high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips used by the AI industry.】

item.title: 中国关税生效，加拿大农民面临双线贸易战
item.description: 加拿大农民正面临双线贸易战，中国对加拿大菜籽油、菜籽粕和豌豆征收的关税将于周四生效，而美国预计将在两周内对更多加拿大产品征收关税。【原文：Canadian farmers are facing a two-front trade war, with China's tariffs on Canadian canola oil, canola meal and peas taking effect on Thursday and U.S. tariffs expected on additional Canadian products within two weeks.】

item.title: 美国西南部电网运营商向西部扩张
item.description: 美国西南部电力联营公司（SPP）表示，能源监管机构周四批准西南部电力联营公司（Southwest Power Pool）扩大其疆域，并成为美国第一个在国家电力系统西部和东部互联地区运营的地区性电网。【原文：Energy regulators on Thursday approved the Southwest Power Pool to expand its territory and become the first regional U.S. grid to operate in both the western and eastern interconnections of the country's electrical system, SPP said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Perplexity AI 正在洽谈以 180 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士周四告诉路透社，Perplexity AI 正在洽谈以 180 亿美元的估值进行融资，这家由英伟达（Nvidia）支持的初创公司正寻求发展壮大，并抓住搜索工具需求激增的机遇。【原文：Perplexity AI is in talks to raise funds at an $18 billion valuation, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday, as the Nvidia-backed startup looks to grow and capture soaring demand for its search tools.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易动荡让外国央行猜不透
item.description: 随着外国央行和其他国家正视唐纳德-特朗普总统快速调整国际贸易的努力所带来的溢出效应，经济增长放缓与通胀重现交织在一起，有可能使美国从全球经济的佼佼者变为世界其他国家的拖累者。【原文：Slowing economic growth mixed with a bout of renewed inflation risks moving the U.S. from global overachiever to a drag on the rest of the world as foreign central banks and others confront the spillovers from President Donald Trump's fast-moving effort to rewire international trade.】

item.title: 迪士尼投资者拒绝退出人权委员会多元化指数的提议
item.description: 迪士尼股东否决了一项投资者提议，即退出人权运动的企业公平指数，该指数对工作场所的女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋、变性人和同性恋者的平等性进行评级。【原文：Disney shareholders rejected an investor proposal to withdraw participation in the Human Rights Campaign's corporate equity index, which rates workplaces on lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer equality.】

item.title: 美国司法部长称，针对特斯拉的纵火犯将面临指控
item.description: 美国司法部长帕梅拉-邦迪（Pamela Bondi）周四表示，已有三人因特斯拉汽车经销商和充电站纵火事件受到指控。 司法部没有具体说明指控罪名，但表示这些人每人将面临 5 到 20 年的监禁。【原文：U.S. Attorney General Pamela Bondi on Thursday said three people have been charged related to arson incidents at Tesla car dealerships and charging stations. Without specifying the charges, the Justice Department said the individuals each face between five and 20 years in prison.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官表示将开设量子计算实验室
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋周四表示，Nvidia 将在波士顿开设量子计算研究实验室，计划与哈佛大学和麻省理工学院的科学家合作。【原文：Nvidia will open a quantum computing research lab in Boston, where it plans to collaborate with scientists from Harvard University and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，通用汽车和现代汽车正在就在北美共享皮卡和电动货车进行谈判
item.description: 据一位熟悉谈判情况的消息人士透露，现代汽车和通用汽车即将敲定一项协议，现代汽车将与美国汽车巨头共享两款电动商用车型。【原文：Hyundai Motor and General Motors are close to finalizing a deal for Hyundai to share two electric commercial van models with the U.S. auto giant, according to a source familiar with the talks and Hyundai documents reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，如果资本需求不减少，瑞银可能会搬迁瑞士总部
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，如果瑞士强制要求瑞银集团增持 250 亿美元的资本金，瑞银集团正在探索搬迁总部的方案。【原文：UBS Group AG is exploring options to relocate its headquarters if Switzerland enforces a requirement for the bank to hold an extra $25 billion in capital, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉因安全问题退出温哥华国际车展
item.description: 加拿大温哥华国际车展主办方周四表示，出于安全考虑，特斯拉已被取消参展资格。【原文：Tesla was removed from the Vancouver International Auto Show in Canada because of safety concerns, the event organizers said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果调整人工智能高管团队，希望扭转 Siri 的颓势
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周四援引熟悉情况的人士的话报道称，苹果公司正在调整高管团队，以使其人工智能工作在经历数月的拖延后重回正轨。【原文：Apple is shaking up its executive ranks to get its AI efforts back on track after months of delays, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: IIR 表示，菲利普斯 66 的伍德河炼油厂正在按计划进行转产
item.description: 研究公司 IIR Energy 周四表示，菲利普斯 66 日产量 35.65 万桶的伍德河炼油厂正在进行转产。【原文：Phillips 66's 356,500 barrel-per-day Wood River refinery is undergoing a turnaround, research company IIR Energy said on Thursday.】

item.title: 礼来公司在印度推出减肥药，为瞄准巨大市场的竞争对手注入活力
item.description: 礼来公司周四在印度推出了糖尿病和减肥药物 Mounjaro，该药物自 2022 年在美国上市以来，全球销售额已超过 200 亿美元。【原文：Eli Lilly on Thursday launched in India its diabetes and weight-loss drug, Mounjaro, which has already clocked in over $20 billion in global sales since its initial U.S. launch in 2022.】

item.title: ABB评估特朗普命令对多样性、公平性和包容性的影响
item.description: ABB 工程公司周四表示，正在评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的行政命令对多元化、公平和包容政策的影响，尽管该公司并未对其运营做出任何改变。【原文：ABB is evaluating the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's executive orders on diversity, equity and inclusion policies, the engineering company said on Thursday, although it has made no changes to its operations.】

item.title: 德国慕尼黑再保险公司将斥资 26 亿美元收购 Next 保险公司
item.description: 慕尼黑再保险公司（Munich Re）的一个部门周四表示，该公司将收购其尚未拥有的 Next Insurance 71% 的股份，以加强其在美国的立足点，并将这家总部位于加利福尼亚州的公司估值为 26 亿美元。【原文：Munich Re is buying the 71% of Next Insurance that it doesn't already own, strengthening its foothold in the United States and valuing the California-based company at $2.6 billion, a division of the German company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雀巢以成本上升为由剥离德国两家工厂
item.description: 全球最大的包装食品公司雀巢公司周四表示，将剥离德国的两家工厂，理由是成本上升和消费者对价格的敏感性导致产能过剩。【原文：Nestle will divest two factories in Germany, the world's largest packaged food company said on Thursday, citing overcapacity due to rising costs and consumer price sensitivity.】

item.title: 在印度新一轮审查制度斗争中，X 公司就内容删除问题起诉莫迪政府
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司在对新德里提起的新诉讼中称，印度信息技术部非法扩大了审查权力，允许更容易地删除在线内容，并授权 "无数 "政府官员执行此类命令。【原文：India's IT ministry has unlawfully expanded censorship powers to allow the easier removal of online content and empowered "countless" government officials to execute such orders, Elon Musk's X has alleged in a new lawsuit against New Delhi.】

item.title: PREVIEW 耐克因需求停滞而出现五年来最严重的收入下滑
item.description: 由于耐克的新产品未能打开美国人的钱包，他们不愿购买体育用品和服装等非必需品，预计耐克将在本周四发布的季度财报中公布近五年来最大幅度的收入下滑。【原文：Nike is expected to post its steepest revenue decline in nearly five years in its quarterly results on Thursday, as its new products failed to open the wallets of Americans reluctant to snap up non-essential items like sporting goods and clothing.】

item.title: Meta 将在加拿大大选前要求公开使用人工智能的政治广告
item.description: Meta Platforms 将要求广告商披露使用人工智能或其他数字技术制作或更改政治或社会问题广告的情况。【原文：Meta Platforms will ask advertisers to disclose the use of AI or other digital techniques to create or alter a political or social issue ad, the Facebook-owner said on Thursday, aiming to curb misinformation ahead of the Canadian federal elections.】
